articles.title: Baby Formula Recalled After Infant Botulism Outbreak - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Baby formula manufacturer ByHeart Inc. agreed to recall some of its powdered formula after 13 infants were diagnosed with botulism after consuming the product.

articles.title: China consumer prices return to growth in October, producer price slump extends to three years - CNBC

articles.title: Data Fog Intensifying for Fed as Shutdown Delays US Inflation Numbers - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Two monthly jobs reports have fallen victim to the longest US government shutdown and a key inflation snapshot due in the coming week is also in jeopardy, illustrating a thickening data fog for a Federal Reserve that’s the most divided in recent memory.
